about_the_game:
BLOCKY.GO! is a single player platformer game made by the TikTok community where they give ideas and then those ideas get put in the game, with great graphics and every map with a different difficulty ! Definitely not based on a youtuber that talks about milk that had the idea to make a parkour game off the comment section of every video. I don't copy, NEVER

Features


    6 levels

    3 different skins

    Is hard

    You can shoot at some stuff with a gun

    Has a new movement system

    Takes more than a hour to beat (minus the raging)





So what are you waiting for ? Go ahead and jump in the action for free!
detailed_description:
BLOCKY.GO! is a single player platformer game made by the TikTok community where they give ideas and then those ideas get put in the game, with great graphics and every map with a different difficulty ! Definitely not based on a youtuber that talks about milk that had the idea to make a parkour game off the comment section of every video. I don't copy, NEVER

Features


    6 levels

    3 different skins

    Is hard

    You can shoot at some stuff with a gun

    Has a new movement system

    Takes more than a hour to beat (minus the raging)





So what are you waiting for ? Go ahead and jump in the action for free!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MACos BigSur and up
  • Processor: intel core i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris 1500 mb graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: needed
  • Additional Notes: smooth fps will only be possible on low quality graphics preset in the game's option menu
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MACos BigSur and up
  • Processor: M1 Max , M1 ultra
  • Memory: 128 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 Max , M1 ultra
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: needed
  • Additional Notes: it is highly recommended to play on low quality graphics preset in the game's option menu or your average fps will be 30-60

name: BLOCKY.GO!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7,8,10,11
  • Processor: intel core i5 8th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gforce gtx 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: needed
  • Additional Notes: running on low quality graphics in the game options will give you better performance
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7,10
  • Processor: intel core i7 7th gen
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gforce gtx 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 520 MB available space
  • Sound Card: needed
  • Additional Notes: running on high quality graphics in the game options will be smooth

short_description: Fun platformer to play when bored
